name: vindictiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or an act of showing a wish to harm someone because you think they have harmed you: The refusal to grant him parole is sheer vindictiveness. She was intensely biased against him and apparently motivated by pure vindictiveness. See
vindictive
More examplesFewer examplesI have faced a campaign that has been driven by vindictiveness and retaliation.They were motivated by vindictiveness, or just plain cruelty.His generosity to his friends was matched by vindictiveness to those who fell out of his favour.
